languages.text: "Тебе назначена служба на этом корабле — твое место в замысле Империума. И ты хочешь нарушить этот порядок? Мне следовало бы казнить тебя за дерзость".
languages.translation_comment: При выборе дать 1 на каунтер CandidateBreak
При выборе дать 1 на каунтер CandidateBreak

languages.text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."
languages.original_text: "Тебе назначена служба на этом корабле — твое место в замысле Империума. И ты хочешь нарушить этот порядок? Мне следовало бы казнить тебя за дерзость".

traits.locale_text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. It is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."
"You were assigned a position on this ship. It is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."
"You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."
"You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."
"You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."
"You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."

languages.text: « Vous avez été affecté à un poste sur ce vaisseau. C'est votre place au sein de l'Imperium, et vous cherchez à perturber cet ordre ? Je devrais vous faire exécuter pour une telle impudence. »
languages.original_text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez été affecté à un poste sur ce vaisseau. C'est votre place au sein de l'Imperium, et vous cherchez à perturber cet ordre ? Je devrais vous faire exécuter pour une telle impudence. »

languages.text: «Le fue asignado un puesto en esta nave. Ese es el lugar que le corresponde en el orden establecido del Imperium. ¿Y pretende usted contravenir ese orden? Debería ordenar que le ejecutasen por tamaña insolencia».
languages.original_text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."

traits.locale_text: «Le fue asignado un puesto en esta nave. Es el lugar que le corresponde en el orden establecido del Imperium. ¿Y pretende usted contravenir ese orden? Debería ordenar que le ejecutasen por tamaña insolencia».

languages.text: “你的职位属于这艘船，而这就是你在帝国庞大计划中的位置，可现在，你居然想扰乱帝国的秩序？像你这么放肆，我应该把你处死才对。”
languages.original_text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."

traits.locale_text: “你的职位属于这艘船，而这就是你在帝国庞大计划中的位置，可现在，你居然想扰乱帝国的秩序？像你这么放肆，我应该把你处死才对。”

languages.text: 「お前はこの船で仕事を与えられた。それが、帝国内におけるお前の居場所だ。なのに、お前はその秩序を乱そうとするのか？そのような不謹慎な態度には、お前を処刑すべきだ」
languages.original_text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はこの船で仕事を与えられた。帝国内の、お前の居場所だ。なのに、お前その秩序を乱そうとするのか？そのような不謹慎な態度は、処刑すべきだ」

languages.text: "Euch wurde eine Position auf diesem Schiff zugewiesen. Das ist Euer Platz im Plan des Imperiums. Und Ihr wollt diese Ordnung stören? Für diese Unverfrorenheit sollte ich Euch hinrichten lassen."
languages.original_text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."

traits.locale_text: "Euch wurde eine Position auf diesem Schiff zugewiesen. Sie ist Euer Platz im Plan des Imperiums. Und Ihr wollt diese Ordnung stören? Für diese Unverfrorenheit sollte ich Euch hinrichten lassen."

languages.text: "Bu gemide bir mevkiye atandın. İmparatorluk'un tasarımındaki yerin budur. Bu düzeni bozmayı mı amaçlıyorsun? Yaptığın bu küstahlıktan ötürü seni idam ettirebilirim."
languages.original_text: "You were assigned a position on this ship. That is your place in the Imperium's design. And you seek to upset that order? I ought to have you executed for such impudence."
